snippet.title: Malita: Soul of a Warrior Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The project is "Malita, Soul of a Warrior", an academic project developed by students of the Bachelor’s Degree in Video Games by UPC at CITM.

It is an Action RPG, with big influence of Hack and Slash games, oriented to be played with controller. The player controls Alita, plays through 3 levels with a narrated story. It features infinite replayable value, thanks to a dynamic combat system which the player can get better at, and a skill tree that allows each playthrough to be completely different.


Please be sure to check out our webpage: https://project3bcn.wixsite.com/malita
Follow twitter: https://twitter.com/malitathegame
Follow instagram: https://www.instagram.com/malitagame/
Get in the Discord: https://discord.gg/uajgsYg 

Contact: malitathegame0@gmail.com
